byline: Karen Clark, Amy Scott, Sally Herships, David Brancaccio, Rupert Wingfield-Hayes, Jeremy Hobson, Noel King and Anbarasan Ethirajan
teaser: Though cigarette usage is dropping, the tobacco industry is expected to post profits. We take a look at their new product lines. Does the U.S. stand to benefit from Japan's territorial dispute with China? And, what does the word 'welfare' mean to you?
description: Though cigarette usage is dropping, the tobacco industry is expected to post profits. We take a look at their new product lines. Does the U.S. stand to benefit from Japan's territorial dispute with China? And, what does the word 'welfare' mean to you?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, April 24, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, April 24, 2013
